package.name: org.omoa
package.shortDescription: This is the root package: <b>If you want to USE omoa start here.</b>
package.description: This is the root package: <b>If you want to USE omoa start here.</b>

package.name: org.omoa.framework
package.shortDescription: This is the omoa extension package: <b>Read this if you want to EXTEND omoa.</b>
package.description: This is the omoa extension package: <b>Read this if you want to EXTEND omoa.</b>

package.name: org.omoa.classification
package.shortDescription: In the classification package you'll find classes that fetch data from a DataModel and turn them into styles, size or color values.
package.description: In the classification package you'll find classes that fetch data from a DataModel and turn them into styles, size or color values.

package.name: org.omoa.datamodel
package.shortDescription: The datamodel package contains everything that is involved with non-spatial data: DataModel, ModelDimension, import filters et cetera.
package.description: The datamodel package contains everything that is involved with non-spatial data: DataModel, ModelDimension, import filters et cetera.

package.name: org.omoa.event
package.shortDescription: Contains event classes that are specific to omoa.
package.description: Event classes that are specific to omoa.

package.name: org.omoa.layer
package.shortDescription: Contains the layer implementations. The maps in a MapFrame consist of layers.
package.description: Contains the layer implementations. The maps in a MapFrame consist of layers.

package.name: org.omoa.overlay
package.shortDescription: Not unlike layers overlays can visualize spatial data. The are visualized on top of the map view.
package.description: Not unlike layers overlays can visualize spatial data. The are visualized on top of the map view.

package.name: org.omoa.projection
package.shortDescription: The projection package contains the map projection classes... it's quite empty since omoa does not support real time projection at the moment.
package.description: The projection package contains the map projection classes... it's quite empty since omoa does not support real time projection at the moment.

package.name: org.omoa.spacemodel
package.shortDescription: Contains the classes that are needed to load, store and process spatial data.
package.description: Contains the classes that are needed to load, store and process spatial data.

package.name: org.omoa.symbol
package.shortDescription: Contains the symbolization classes that are use, for example, by the symbol layer. Symbols visualize spatial data.
package.description: Contains the symbolization classes that are use, for example, by the symbol layer. Symbols visualize spatial data.
